import React from 'react' import styles from './AddRoomModal.module.css'; import TextInput from '../shared/TextInput/TextInput'; import { useState } from 'react'; const AddRoomModal = ({onClose}) => { const [roomType, setRoomType] = useState('Public'); const [topic, setTopic] = useState(''); return (

Enter the topic to be discussed

setTopic(e.target.value)} />

Room Types

setRoomType('Public')} className={`${styles.typeBox} ${roomType === 'Public' ? styles.active: ''}`}> Public
setRoomType('Social')} className={`${styles.typeBox} ${roomType === 'Social' ? styles.active: ''}`}> Social
setRoomType('Private')} className={`${styles.typeBox} ${roomType === 'Private' ? styles.active: ''}`}> Private

Start a room, open to everyone

) } export default AddRoomModal
